title: The Sessions
description: Dr. Sarah Child is a gifted psychotherapist with second sight. So why can't she see what's wrong with Micah when he's rushed into the hospital half dead? Wanting to help heal his broken mind, she takes him on as a patient at her in-home private practice. She's confident that using her unique form of Aggressive Experiential Client-Centered Psychotherapy will help him, until she finds herself in a fire she can't put out.
author: Azure Boone
